name: Smart Girl's Playhouse
description: Smart Girls: Playhouse is a game that features a collection of casual minigames primarily aimed at very young females. It features 12 different activities to do. Activities include things such as matching the sequential order of sound to the animals who produce them, playing a piano (which can be tuned to also play organ and even cat noises), a card matching memorization game, a simple jigsaw puzzle, and a dress up mode
